strategy: Introduce a neural network ensemble with deep residual blocks (e.g., ResNet-style architectures) trained on normalized features, using dropout layers to mitigate overfitting. Instead of relying solely on tree-based models, leverage the ability of deep networks to capture high-order interactions and non-linear patterns in the data. Preprocess the data with target encoding for categorical variables and apply min-max scaling to ensure numerical stability. Use Bayesian optimization to tune the number of layers, learning rate, and batch size, while validating on a time-based split to preserve temporal coherence in training.

categorical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
